name: 2D-Platformer (infa-education)
description:
The following significant changes have been made in the game compared to the educational version of the game

 

1. The first level has been changed, a second linear and substantially modified third level of the game has been created in the form of three horizontal levels with the player falling down.

2. Added a horizontal platform in the second level.

3. Added a new green strong fast and tenacious enemy in the third level.
